name: Brand Visibility & Recognition
summary: Your brand appears in 78% of relevant AI-generated responses across tested queries.
insights: Strong presence in product comparison queries
Higher visibility in ChatGPT compared to Perplexity
Competitor mentions often appear alongside your brand

issues.title: Weak presence in 'best practices' queries
issues.description: Only 34% mention rate when users ask for implementation guides

issues.title: Inconsistent brand name formatting
issues.description: AI models use 3 different variations of your brand name

recommendations: Publish comprehensive how-to guides and best practices content
Standardize brand name usage across all public content
Build case studies for common use cases
